    • ChatserviceImpl

      public ChatserviceImpl(ServerContext context) throws RemoteException
      Löst aus:
      RemoteException

  • Methodendetails

    • post_message

      public void post_message(String room, String message, String sender)
      Posts a chat message to a specific room.
      Angegeben von:
      post_message in Schnittstelle Chatservice
      Parameter:
      room - the name of the room
      message - the chat message content
      sender - the sender of the message

    • get_messages

      public List<ChatNachricht> get_messages(String room)
      Retrieves all messages from the specified room.
      Angegeben von:
      get_messages in Schnittstelle Chatservice
      Parameter:
      room - the room name
      Gibt zurück:
      list of chat messages in that room

    • update_chat

      public String update_chat() throws Exception
      Updates the current lobby chat content.
      Angegeben von:
      update_chat in Schnittstelle Chatservice
      Gibt zurück:
      current lobby chat as a string
      Löst aus:
      Exception - if internal error occurs

    • sendChatMessage

      public void sendChatMessage(String sender, String message) throws RemoteException
      Sends a chat message from a user and appends it to the global chat history.
      Parameter:
      sender - the username of the message sender
      message - the content of the message
      Löst aus:
      RemoteException - if RMI communication fails

    • getChatHistory

      public List<ChatNachricht> getChatHistory() throws RemoteException
      Retrieves the entire chat history of the lobby.
      Gibt zurück:
      a list of chat messages
      Löst aus:
      RemoteException - if RMI communication fails
